#summary First steps using phloc-commons
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

phloc-css is a Java library that provides support for many basic issues.

Prerequisites: *phloc-commpns depends* on [http://www.slf4j.org/ SLF4J].

= Usage with Maven =

To build phloc-commons from source, Maven 3.0.4 is required. Any version below does *NOT* work!

To use phloc-commons put the following to your pom.xml:
{{{
...
  <repositories>
...
    <repository>
      <id>phloc.com</id>
      <url>http://repo.phloc.com/maven2</url>
      <releases>
        <enabled>true</enabled>
      </releases>
      <snapshots>
        <enabled>true</enabled>
      </snapshots>
    </repository>
  </repositories>
...
  <dependencies>
    ...
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.phloc</groupId>
      <artifactId>phloc-commons</artifactId>
      <version>4.0.3</version>
    </dependency>
  </dependencies>
...
}}}
